scripts.build:lcu: ng build lcu --prod --single-bundle && npm run pack:lcu
scripts.build:lcu-parts: ng build lcu-parts --prod --single-bundle && npm run pack:lcu-parts
scripts.demo: npm run build:common && npm run start:demo
scripts.demo:lcu: npm run build:common && npm run build:lcu && npm run start:demo
scripts.deploy: npm version patch && npm run deploy:all
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:common && npm run deploy:lcu && npm run deploy:lcu-parts && npm run deploy:demo
scripts.deploy:common: npm version patch --prefix projects/common && npm run build:common && npm publish ./dist/common --access public
scripts.deploy:demo: npm version patch --prefix projects/demo && npm run build:demo && npm publish ./dist/demo --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu && npm run build:lcu && npm publish ./dist/lcu --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-parts: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-parts && npm run build:lcu-parts && npm publish ./dist/lcu-parts --access public
scripts.pack:lcu: rimraf dist/lcu/wc && mkdirp dist/lcu/wc && npm run pack:lcu:main && npm run pack:lcu:pollyfills && npm run pack:lcu:join && npm run pack:lcu:styles
scripts.pack:lcu-parts: rimraf dist/lcu-parts/wc && mkdirp dist/lcu-parts/wc && npm run pack:lcu-parts:main && npm run pack:lcu-parts:pollyfills && npm run pack:lcu-parts:join && npm run pack:lcu-parts:styles
scripts.build: npm run build:common && npm run build:lcu
